EmailTemplate.name: CRADA Requires Signature TPO Dir
EmailTemplate.subject: CRADA Requires Signature TPO Director
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
The CRADA with {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Partner__c} for the project titled {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Title__c} has been fully executed. Please find attached a copy for your records.
This CRADA will be active from {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Start_Date__c} to {!Agreement__c.Agreement_End_Date__c}. If you require any modifications, including extension in duration, please contact {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Officer__c}.
Thank you.
